name: Destroyer: Invasion
description: In Soviet Russia, Space Hears You Scream! Earth is a memory, its children have escaped to their new colonies spread among the stars. But now, the young colonies face a new and unexpected threat. Join the New Russian Republic as they fight for the future!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 64-bit Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Pro or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
